title: Was named leaver but was not the leaver?
body:
I was playing a ranked game earlier and was named as the leaver of a game, when I clearly was not. I have photographic evidence. Is there a way to get my LP refunded and my "leaver buster" status removed? The penalty was obviously meant for the leaver and not me.

rito help plz?

replies.body:
http://imgur.com/HvzAnf5

Does this NOT help? I mean come on.

0 cs and level 1 at 3 minutes seems pretty afk to me. Sure you connected and bought items, but that's about it. 

I get that it's bronze 5 and csing standards are pretty low, but the other players managed to get to level 2 and a few cs at least. (It also wouldn't really surprise me if the braum also was hit with the remake penalty since it doesn't look like he made it to lane either.)

Hello Mini,

This Riot support article here can answer your questions --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ.

Sadly, it looks like you cannot get your LP refunded or leaverbuster status removed because "Our system does not allow the removal of leaves or the modification of MMR. It was designed in this manner in order to prevent corruption." (See Additional Information: I CRASHED AND GOT A LEAVE/MMR LOSS. CAN I GET THOSE REMOVED FROM MY ACCOUNT?)

I hope this helps!
I was not the person who left. I have photographic evidence.

Mini - I am just a player not a Riot helper, but looking at your supplied image I think is not as good proof as you think. In fact it suggests why you got the penalty too.

The "true leaver" had exactly 659 gold, 0 other stats. You had exactly 659 gold, 0 other stats. Everyone else in both teams had more.

This combined with what the Riot people stated earlier suggests that you either had client issues too, or you were AFK. Hence why they are saying they can not fix your demerit.

Hey, I looked into this for you see what exactly happened.  It looks like you were marked as afk in addition to another player, which prompted the remake vote.  Based on what I've seen, it does seem like you were not participating during the [remake period](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ).  We won't be able to remove any penalties in this case, but feel free to his us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like more context.  Hope that helps clear things up otherwise!
RITO? PLEASE? LOOK AT THE PHOTO BELOW?

i was in the game from the time it loaded until the time it was voted to remake, I bought Items and moved my character around the map and even went B. There is no reason that I should receive this penalty.

can I get an official statement from Riot about this please? you can obviously see in the picture that it was someone else that was the leaver in this situation. I should not have to take a penalty for them on a remake, correct?

Hello again!

If leaverbuster flagged your account it means you either d/c'd and didn't come back or straight up left. Unfortunately as I said, the leaverbuster and LP refund cannot be undone. 

Leaverbuster will not trigger immediately with a low priority queue unless there is a history of leaving games. What normally happens is the person affected is given a 5 minute delay (for the first offense) before they can queue for a game.
